snippet: A fire at the Flight 93 National Memorial in Shanksville badly burned three administrative buildings Friday.
abstract: Three administrative buildings at Flight 93 National Memorial in Shanksville, Pa, are badly burned during fire; officials are concerned about damage to memorabilia and archived material stored there.
lead_paragraph: A fire at the Flight 93 National Memorial in Shanksville badly burned three administrative buildings Friday.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Fire Damages Buildings at Flight 93 Memorial
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Fire Damages Buildings at Memorial
